title: Woodhead Publishing Series in Electronic and Optical Materials
description:
[Updated at 2016.03.24]


Books in the Electronic and optical materials series are state-of-the-art reviews covering recent research in electronic materials, optical materials, sensors, MEMS and communications. The electronic materials discussed include semiconductors, thin films and emerging nanomaterials. The books cover diverse topics such as nanophotonics, plasmonics, lasers, nonlinear optics, LEDs, optical sensing and imaging. Major trends covered in the sensors and MEMS area are sensor networks, detection, monitoring, multifunctional/smart materials and microtechnologies. The applications of electronic and optical technologies in wireless communications and optical communications are explored. These comprehensive titles are essential for academics and students, and professional scientists, engineers and managers in industry
